Optional aPosition

aPosition: function
  • Defined in geometries/GridGeometryOptions.ts:18

A parametric function determining the positions of points in the grid.

0 <= u <= 1 0 <= v <= 1

attribute

aPosition

type

(u: number, v: number) => VectorE3

optional
default

() => (u, v, 0)

Type declaration

    • (u: number, v: number): VectorE3

    • Parameters

      • u: number
      • v: number

      Returns VectorE3

Optional k

k: number

Inherited from GeometryOptions.k

  • Defined in geometries/GeometryOptions.ts:34

Determines whether the Geometry will be constructed as points, lines, or triangles.

0: points 1: lines 2: triangles

Optional mode

mode: BeginMode
  • Defined in geometries/GridGeometryOptions.ts:30
default

LINES

Optional offset

offset: VectorE3

Inherited from GeometryOptions.offset

  • Defined in geometries/GeometryOptions.ts:13

A translation from the canonical position. This is the third and last operation applied to canonical vertex data.

Optional stress

stress: VectorE3

Inherited from GeometryOptions.stress

  • Defined in geometries/GeometryOptions.ts:19

A scaling along the standard basis directions from the canonical unit scaling. This is the first operation applied to canonical vertex data.

Optional tilt

tilt: SpinorE3

Inherited from GeometryOptions.tilt

  • Defined in geometries/GeometryOptions.ts:25

A rotation from the canonical attitude. This is the second operation applied to canonical vertex data.
